page.title: 10CHARLTON_H.LAW AND ORDER
page.content:
LOCAL{POLICE}CONSTABLE RESIDES IN CRUDWELL.PATROLS BY CAR AND IS RESPONSIBLE FOR DEALING WITH ACCIDENTS,AND THEFT AND MAINTAINING LAW AND ORDER IN THE AREA.BACK UP ASSISTANCE FROM MALMESBURY AND FURTHER HELP AT CHIPPENHAM.
{CIVIL DEFENCE. _____________ A CIVIL DEFENCE COMMITTEE HAS BEEN FORMED WITH MEMBERS DRAWN FROM THOSE WHO HAVE TAKEN THE NORTH WILTS.CITIZEN'S ADVISORY COURSE.THE COMMITTEE IS AT PRESENT WORKING ON EMERGENCY PLANS TO BE PUT INTO EFFECT IN THE EVENT OF A NUCLEAR ATTACK.
